Members can then customize this value.</resource> <resource name="RequireEmailVerification_Name">Require User Email Verification</resource> <resource name="RequireEmailVerification_Description">When enabled, email address changes must be confirmed via a link sent to that email prior to being used on the site. 	New accounts will not be able to log in until at least one email address is verified. 	If new accounts do not verify an email address within the <a href="/administration#_aptype=panel&amp;_appanelid=5a458966-4c87-4acd-9afd-c3f7800a4235">Abuse Expunge Time Window</a>, the account will be removed. 	If your <a href="/administration#_aptype=panel&amp;_appanelid=f55959dd-ec89-46b1-92b9-40b8ae72b75a">Account Activation Mode</a> is 'Email', verification only applies to users updating their email(s).</resource> </language>
